abstract: Microsoft announced a deal to distribute films from the Walt Disney Company on Microsoft’s Xbox Live Internet service and outlined a broader array of games.
snippet: Microsoft announced a deal to distribute films from the Walt Disney Company on Microsoft’s Xbox Live Internet service and outlined a broader array of games.
lead_paragraph: SANTA MONICA, Calif., July 10 — As Microsoft executives played down the impact of an extensive repair program for defective Xbox 360 game machines, they announced several efforts to broaden the appeal of their machine to families.

headline.main: Microsoft Plays Up Family Appeal of Xbox
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Plays Up Family Appeal of Xbox
